decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (FP01-DW-02-15, FP02-DW-02-15, FP03-DW-02-15, FP04-DW-02-15, FP05-DW-02-15, FP06-DW-02-15, FP07-DW-02-15, dated 25.02.15, received 06/03/2015; Design and Access Statement, dated Feb 2015, received 05/03/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the extension hereby approved without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a rear roof extension with hip to gable conversion, two roof windows to front elevation, and one roof light to rear roof slope.
